channel.title: Real Dragon claw animation special

item.title: Real Dragon claw animation special
item.dc:creator: @bloodmaniet bloodmaniet
item.description:
@bloodmaniet wrote:

Recently i have added correct Dclaw special like real rs with the emote and animation. but on npcs when u use the special attack it goes through the whole emote 100% but on players it starts off at the beginning of the emote then starts back to the original special attk on players… how would i set it up to make it last the 100% of the spec?

here is what i have…:

} if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ specialAtk(true, 50, 600, 6000); DclawDamage = 4; specOn = true; DclawDamg1 = misc.random(Math.round(((playerMaxHit)*20)/15)); }

} if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49){ setAnimation(6000); specialAmount -= 50; hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(20) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee); specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); dclaws = 3; }

And for Npcs(that works on them 100% through the whole entire emote:

} if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002 && specialAmount > 49) { specialAtkNPC(true, 50, 600, 6000); dclaws = 3; hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit + 20); }

someone please help me thanks.

Read full topic
